alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 12:22AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sunflower, northeastern Washington and south central Bolivar Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1222 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Metcalfe, or near Greenville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Leland around 1235 AM CDT. Arcola and Tribbett around 1245 AM CDT. Estill around 1250 AM CDT. Darlove around 1255 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and central and northwestern Mississippi.
